languages.text: {n}Ваши слова вызывают у Ирлиэт легкую улыбку.{/n} "Если бы это было так просто, элантах. Даже пустой камень душ нужно уметь приковать к душе, срастить с внутренним миром, суметь его обуздать. Лишь особые касты провидцев способны на подобное, но теперь собратья отвернулись от меня... Впрочем, не в первый раз".

{n}Your words make Yrliet smile slightly.{/n} "If only it were that easy, elantach. One must know how to bond an empty spirit stone with a soul, intertwine it with one's inner world, and be able to contain it. Only the Farseer castes are capable of such a feat, but now my kin have turned their backs on me... and not for the first time."
languages.original_text: {n}Ваши слова вызывают у Ирлиэт легкую улыбку.{/n} "Если бы это было так просто, элантах. Даже пустой камень душ нужно уметь приковать к душе, срастить с внутренним миром, суметь его обуздать. Лишь особые касты провидцев способны на подобное, но теперь собратья отвернулись от меня... Впрочем, не в первый раз".

traits.locale_text: {n}Your words make Yrliet smile slightly.{/n} "If only it was this easy, elantach. One has to have the knowledge of how to bond an empty spirit stone with the soul, intertwine it with the inner world, and be able to curb it. Only the Farseer castes are capable of such a feat, but now my kinsmen have turned their backs on me... Not for the first time, though."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}听到你的话，伊莉耶特微微一笑。{/n}“要是真有这么简单就好了，外界人。若要制作新的灵魂石，制作者必须知道如何将无主的灵魂石与灵魂结合在一起，再在自己的世界中将它们融为一体，同时能够控制它的力量。只有先知一族拥有这样的能力，可我的族人……又一次抛弃了我。”
languages.original_text: {n}Your words make Yrliet smile slightly.{/n} "If only it were that easy, elantach. One must know how to bond an empty spirit stone with a soul, intertwine it with one's inner world, and be able to contain it. Only the Farseer castes are capable of such a feat, but now my kin have turned their backs on me... and not for the first time."

traits.locale_text: {n}听到你的话，伊莉耶特微微一笑。{/n}“要是真有这么简单就好了，外界人。若要制作新的灵魂石，制作者必须知道如何将无主的灵魂石与灵魂结合在一起，再在自己的世界中将它们融为一体，同时能够控制它的力量。只有先知一族拥有这样的能力，可我的族人……又一次抛弃了我。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tus palabras arrancan una leve sonrisa a Yrliet.{/n} «Ojalá fuese tan sencillo, elantach. Uno ha de saber cómo vincular su alma a una joya espiritual vacía, entrelazarla con su mundo interior y ser capaz de contenerla. Solo la casta de los videntes es capaz de semejante proeza, pero ahora mi gente me ha dado la espalda... y no es la primera vez».
languages.original_text: {n}Your words make Yrliet smile slightly.{/n} "If only it were that easy, elantach. One must know how to bond an empty spirit stone with a soul, intertwine it with one's inner world, and be able to contain it. Only the Farseer castes are capable of such a feat, but now my kin have turned their backs on me... and not for the first time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus palabras arrancan una leve sonrisa a Yrliet.{/n} «Ojalá fuese tan sencillo, elantach. Uno ha de saber cómo vincular su alma a una joya espiritual vacía, entrelazarla con su mundo interior y ser capaz de contenerla. Solo la casta de los videntes es capaz de semejante proeza, pero ahora mi gente me ha dado la espalda... y no es la primera vez».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vos paroles font naître un léger sourire sur les lèvres d'Yrliet.{/n} « Si seulement c'était aussi simple, elantach. Pour cela, il faut savoir lier une pierre-esprit vide avec une âme, y entremêler son monde intérieur et parvenir à l'y contenir. Seuls les Grands Prophètes sont capables d'une telle prouesse, et mes semblables m'ont tourné le dos... une fois encore. »
languages.original_text: {n}Your words make Yrliet smile slightly.{/n} "If only it were that easy, elantach. One must know how to bond an empty spirit stone with a soul, intertwine it with one's inner world, and be able to contain it. Only the Farseer castes are capable of such a feat, but now my kin have turned their backs on me... and not for the first time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos paroles font naître un léger sourire sur les lèvres d'Yrliet.{/n} « Si seulement c'était aussi simple, elantach. Pour cela, il faut savoir lier une pierre-esprit vide avec une âme, y entremêler son monde intérieur et parvenir à l'y contenir. Seuls les Grands Prophètes sont capables d'une telle prouesse, et mes semblables m'ont tourné le dos... une fois encore. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Deine Worte bringen Yrliet zum Lächeln.{/n} "Wenn das nur so einfach wäre, Elantach. Man muss dazu wissen, wie man einen leeren Seelenstein mit einer Seele verbindet, dann mit der eigenen inneren Welt, und dann muss das Ganze noch bewahrt werden. Nur Runenpropheten sind dazu in der Lage, aber meine Leute haben mir den Rücken zurückgekehrt ... und das nicht zum ersten Mal."
languages.original_text: {n}Your words make Yrliet smile slightly.{/n} "If only it were that easy, elantach. One must know how to bond an empty spirit stone with a soul, intertwine it with one's inner world, and be able to contain it. Only the Farseer castes are capable of such a feat, but now my kin have turned their backs on me... and not for the first time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Worte bringen Yrliet zum Lächeln.{/n} "Wenn das nur so einfach wäre, Elantach. Man muss dazu wissen, wie man einen leeren Seelenstein mit einer Seele verbindet, dann mit der eigenen inneren Welt, und dann muss das Ganze noch bewahrt werden. Nur Runenpropheten sind dazu in der Lage, aber meine Leute haben mir den Rücken zurückgekehrt ... und das nicht zum ersten Mal."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたの言葉に、ユリエットは微かに微笑む。{/n}「そう簡単であればいいのだが、エランタよ。空っぽの魂縛石を魂と結びつけ、自分の内なる世界と絡ませ、封じ込める方法を知らなければならない。そのようなことができるのは先見司だけだ。だが今、私のキンは私に背を向けている…それも初めてではない」
languages.original_text: {n}Your words make Yrliet smile slightly.{/n} "If only it were that easy, elantach. One must know how to bond an empty spirit stone with a soul, intertwine it with one's inner world, and be able to contain it. Only the Farseer castes are capable of such a feat, but now my kin have turned their backs on me... and not for the first time."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの言葉に、ユリエットは微かに微笑む。{/n}「そう簡単であればいいのだが、エランタよ。空っぽの魂縛石を魂と結びつけ、自分の内なる世界と絡ませ、封じ込める方法を知らなければならない。そのようなことができるのは先見司だけだ。だが今、私のキンは私に背を向けている…それも初めてではない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sözlerin Yrliet'i gülümsetiyor.{/n} "Keşke o kadar kolay olsaydı elantach. Boş bir ruh taşını ruha bağlamayı, iç dünyamla eşleştirmeyi ve onu korumayı başarmam gerekir. Bunu sadece Ötesezen büyüleri gerçekleştirebilir. Oysa soydaşlarım bana sırtlarını döndü. Bunu ilk kez yapmıyorlar."
languages.original_text: {n}Your words make Yrliet smile slightly.{/n} "If only it were that easy, elantach. One must know how to bond an empty spirit stone with a soul, intertwine it with one's inner world, and be able to contain it. Only the Farseer castes are capable of such a feat, but now my kin have turned their backs on me... and not for the first time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sözlerin Yrliet'i gülümsetiyor.{/n} "Keşke o kadar kolay olsaydı elantach. Boş bir ruh taşını ruha bağlamayı, iç dünyamla eşleştirmeyi ve onu korumayı başarmam gerekir. Bunu sadece Ötesezen büyüleri gerçekleştirebilir ama artık soydaşlarım bana sırtlarını döndü. Hem de bu ilk değil."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
